schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
type Query {
    # Find a company by homepage url (e.g., delta.com)
    company(domain: String!): Company
    # All loaded companies
    companies: [Company]
}

# Business enterprise
type Company {
    id: ID!
    # English name
    name: String
    # Primary website URL
    homepage: String
    # Company logo URL
    logoUrl: String
    # CEO or other senior leader
    executive: Person
    # People who work or worked for the company, other than the CEO
    employees: [Person]
}

# Human
type Person {
    id: ID!
    # Full name
    name: String
    # Company for which the person works
    employer: Company
    # Online photos
    photoURLs: [String]
}
